snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig said a 17-member diversity task force to study and address the issue of the drop in on-field participation by blacks will have its first meeting Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig said a 17-member diversity task force to study and address the issue of the drop in on-field participation by blacks will have its first meeting Wednesday.

headline.seo: Baseball Creates Committee to Study Decline of Blacks in the Majors
headline.main: Baseball Creates Committee to Study Decline of Blacks in the Majors
headline.print_headline: Baseball Creates Committee to Study Decline of Blacks in the Majors
